metadata.title: CVE-2024-26977 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pci_iounmap(): Fix MMIO mapping leak The #ifdef ARCH_HAS_GENERIC_IOPORT_MAPaccidentally also guards iounmap(), which means MMIO mappings are leaked.Move the guard so we call iounmap() for MMIO mappings.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
